content: next st slip_stitch in next st across the yoke until you lps of chains half_double_crochet in same chain as join slip_stitch in next reach marker #1 working evenly into the short row chain half_double_crochet in next chain across the underarm until 1 chain edges half_double_crochet in first row edge then slip_stitch half_double_crochet x6 rem before marker #5 on the short row slip_stitch in last times across the short row until you reach underarm chain working evenly into the short row marker #6 for a total of 13 sts placed evenly across edges half_double_crochet in first row edge then slip_stitch half_double_crochet x6 the short row edges working in both empty lps of times across the short row until you reach chains slip_stitch in next chain half_double_crochet in next chain across the marker #4 on the yoke for a total of 13 sts placed underarm until you reach last st marked with yellow evenly across the short row edges slip_stitch in marked marker slip_stitch in this st move yellow marker in first st half_double_crochet in next st slip_stitch in next st across the yoke st of the round a half_double_crochet and pink marker in last st of dewdrop sweater 2024 pattern and design by crochethighway all rights reserved 14 until 2 sts rem before marker #3 half_double_crochet in next st repeat round 1 67 65 63 61 59 57 53 49 49 47 more slst2tog counts as 1 st in marked st and first times for a total of 68 66 64 62 60 58 54 50 50 underarm chain working in both empty lps of chains 48 sleeve rnds excluding the setup round or until half_double_crochet in next chain slip_stitch in next chain half_double_crochet in next chain desired length the last round is worked on the ws for across the underarm until you reach last st marked a full-length balloon sleeve after last repeat the with yellow marker slip_stitch in this st move yellow sleeve edge should sit approx at your wrist bone marker in first st of the round a half_double_crochet and pink marker in last st of the round a slip_stitch skip the joining slip_stitch from prev round and the tch and join via slip_stitch in top of first you ll now work a series of rounds on the rs only half_double_crochet of the round turn 72 76 82 82 86 88 100 112 around the sleeve reducing the sleeve 120 124 st circumference abruptly in order to close the cuff in around the wrist in a bubble if needed place a single_crochet in remaining sts or skip a single_crochet at the end of the round so that you end up with the correct st count for each cuff round all sizes round 1 rs chain 1 *decrease across next 2 sts repeat from * around join via slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet of the round do not turn 36 38 42 42 44 44 50 56 60 62 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 *decrease across next
